regen.absent_element: specification of the driver confirmation process for automatic transfer to Shunting
regen.new_specification: The system shall require explicit confirmation from the driver to automatically transfer to Shunting at speeds equal to or lower than the supervised shunting speed.

label: Before authomatic transition to Shunting, ETCS shall request confirmation from the driver.
absence: confirmation from the driver if authomatic transition to Shunting
